result.reason: Long-standing user.config corruption causes startup crashes with no diagnostic capability, affecting many users across all versions.
result.approach: Add try-catch with detailed logging around Settings.Default load in SettingsLoader, log user.config path and parse errors to mRemoteNG log file, and implement graceful fallback to defaults when user.config is corrupted instead of crashing.
